entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
